mapper.select: SELECT FUNCURL,FUNCCODE FROM JBOS_FUNC WHERE FUNCURL IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(FUNCURL)!=''

SELECT T.ID,T.PARENTID,T.FUNCCODE,T.FUNCNAME,T.FUNCTYPE,T.FUNCURL FROM JBOS_FUNC T INNER JOIN JBOS_ROLE_FUNC T1 ON T.ID=T1.FUNCID LEFT JOIN JBOS_USER_ROLE T3 ON T1.ROLEID=T3.ROLEID LEFT JOIN JBOS_USER T4 ON T3.USERID=T4.ID WHERE T.ISVALID=1 AND T.PARENTID=#{parentId} AND T4.USERNAME=#{loginName} ORDER BY T.ORDERNO

SELECT T.ID,T.FUNCNAME AS TEXT, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JBOS_FUNC B WHERE B.PARENTID=T.ID)>=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LEAF FROM JBOS_FUNC T WHERE T.ISVALID=1 AND T.PARENTID = #{parentId} ORDER BY T.ORDERNO
